core:action.core:comment: Check void item type to determine void action required

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Fortunately cancel isn't really an option for this

core:action.core:comment: Clear the transaction from data once saved

core:messageState.core:comment: Shouldn't really get here as first iteration has already tested basket items

core:state.core:comment: First iteration determines if there any items which will prevent voiding, then second iteration performs the actual void (in case we are performing onine operations, etc).
